definition: The term "gewachster" refers to an object that has been treated with a specific substance. This substance provides a protective coating or finish, enhancing the durability and appearance of the object. It is commonly used for various items, such as furniture, floors, or certain types of fabric, to improve their resistance to wear and tear, as well as to give them a polished or glossy look.

examples.english: She is wearing a waxed jacket.
